roleset.name: utter a long loud cry
roleset.note: SQUALL-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class Manner_speaking-37.3. No framenet class. Framed by Katie. (from squall.01-v)

example.name: Normal squaller example
example.text: The hungry baby began to squall.

roleset.name: utter a sudden cry
roleset.note: SQUALL-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet class. Framed by Katie. (from squall.02-v)

example.name: Example with temporal and manner
example.text: She squalled with pain when the doctor inserted the needle.
example.arg: when the doctor inserted the needle.

roleset.name: blow strongly
roleset.note: SQUALL-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet class. Framed by Katie. (from squall.03-v)

example.name: Example with location
example.text: The wind squalled all around them.

example.name: Another wind example
example.text: The wind squalled ferociously, and waves broke over the boat.
